description: FAITH is a http://anidb.net/ch1509 [ZAFT] special forces organization whose members report directly to the http://anidb.net/ch1554 [PLANT Supreme Council]. The members of this elite organization operate outside the regular ZAFT command structure, and have the authority to plan operations and give orders on the battlefield as they see fit. FAITH membership is awarded only to individuals with distinguished combat records and excellent personal qualities.
name: FAITH
